entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022
